TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FeatureSupport extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport
Public MustInherit Class FeatureSupport Implements IFeatureSupport
public ref class FeatureSupport abstract : System::Windows::Forms::IFeatureSupport

summary.span: 提供用于从当前系统中检索功能信息的 方法。

span.span: Provides methods for retrieving feature information from the current system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`static`此类当你查询的类信息的方法实现接口。Use the `static` methods of this class when the classes you query for feature information implement the interface. 否则，继承自并提供您自己的实现。Otherwise, inherit from and provide your own implementation. 此类的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this class, see . 若要获取的功能的版本号，请调用。To get the version number of a feature, call . 调用以确定是否安装了特定的功能或功能的版本。Call to determine if a particular feature or version of a feature is installed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用实现，将查询来功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 版本检查以查看它是否是`null`，以确定是否存在该功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the method.

para.span: 当你重写此方法时，请检查你用于类参数是对此参数中使用的类相同方法。

span.span: When you override this method, check that the class that you use for the parameter is the same as the class used for this parameter in the method.

para.span: 如果两个参数不同，则还必须重写。

span.span: If the two parameters differ, you also must override .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取系统上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Version GetVersionPresent (object feature);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Version GetVersionPresent(object feature) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetVersionPresent (feature As Object) As Version
public: abstract Version ^ GetVersionPresent(System::Object ^ feature);

span.span: The feature whose version is requested.

summary.span: 当在一个派生类中被重写后，获取系统中可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the version of the specified feature that is available on the system.

returns.span: ，表示系统中可用的指定功能的版本号；如果未安装此功能，则为 。

span.span: A representing the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本号由三个部分组成： 主要、 次版本号和生成。Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build. 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number". ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用实现，将查询来功能。The following code example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 版本检查以查看它是否是`null`，以确定是否存在该功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承自，必须重写此方法。

summary.span: 获取系统上可用的指定功能的版本。

returns.span: 如果系统上有可用的指定功能的版本号，则为 ；如果未安装该功能，则为 。

span.span: A with the version number of the specified feature available on the system; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本号由三个部分组成： 主要、 次版本号和生成。Version numbers consist of three parts: major, minor, and build. 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number". 请参阅包含的功能，以确定要传递给的名称的产品的文档`featureClassName`和`featureConstName`参数。See the documentation for the product containing the feature to determine the names to pass to the `featureClassName` and the `featureConstName` parameters.

summary.span: 确定系统中是否安装了指定的功能。

span.span: Determines whether the specified feature is installed in the system.

span.span: The feature to look for.

param.name: minimumVersion
param.span: 表示要查找功能的最小版本号。

span.span: A representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.

summary.span: 确定系统中是否安装了指定功能的指定版本或较新版本。

span.span: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is installed in the system.

returns.span: 如果提供该功能，并且其版本号大于或等于指定的最小版本号，则为 ；如果未安装该功能或者其版本号低于指定的最小版本号，则为 。

span.span: if the feature is present and its version number is greater than or equal to the specified minimum version number; if the feature is not installed or its version number is below the specified minimum number.
